metas.overview: 2008 is a 10-minute comedy-drama starring Nickelodeon actress Michaela Jill Murphy and Anja Kao Nielsen, following a young girl navigating her dysfunctional queer household as California voted to repeal gay marriage during the 2008 election.

metas.name: Muse
metas.overview: A struggle for power between a pianist and his unruly muse turns murderous.

metas.name: בדרכים
metas.overview: A teenage boy and his grandmother each follow their own story — his shown through everyday moments, hers told through voice-over poetry. Their separate paths come together briefly before continuing on.

metas.name: Autobiografia di una Borsetta
metas.overview: The film reimagines the life of a Miu Miu Wander bag as it moves between owners, places, and social realities. The bag becomes a silent witness to human experiences—love, loss, and reinvention.

metas.name: Halat
metas.overview: Nila, a younger sister who now feels alienated from her own older sibling. She actually misses the times when their relationship was so close. However, now, every time she sees her older sister, she feels distant. Not understanding what to do, she finally tried to build some talk through cooking. Tracing every memory they have together, hoping that their relationship will return to being as warm as before. They connected conversation after conversation, exchanging news and childhood memories, until finally Nila revealed the anxiety that was hidden deep in her heart. About how the house really is, about her current situation, and about the wrong understanding that has grown within her.

metas.name: LATERAL
metas.overview: Rick, an unsatisfied, middle-aged cinema attendant, stumbles into an endless non-euclidean labyrinth under his work. He soon realises he is not alone.

metas.name: A Noite do Terror!
metas.overview: In this Halloween special, Guilherme Gomes brings us three absolutely terrifying stories!

metas.name: Corta!
metas.overview: Bella lives as if she were the protagonist of a movie, lost in her own hero's journey. Confused about finding her class, she receives vague hints from classmates that make her wonder if it's all in her head.

metas.name: Queer
metas.overview: 1950. William Lee, un expatriado estadounidense de unos 50 años en Ciudad de México, pasa sus días casi solo, salvo algunos contactos con otros miembros de la pequeña comunidad estadounidense. Su encuentro con Eugene Allerton, un joven estudiante recién llegado a la ciudad, le muestra, por primera vez, que finalmente podría ser posible establecer una conexión íntima con alguien.

metas.name: Skate Story: Shortplay Depth I
metas.overview: In the underworld, demons do not sleep. The moon keeps them awake. Most avoid the harsh moonlight and catch what little rest they can. One demon decides to skate through the underworld to reach the moon. This demon will eat the moon and free itself.

metas.name: Guts and Glitz
metas.overview: Audiovisual material gathered by filmmaker Fox Maxy over a decade, including documentary footage, television clips, and animation—sometimes layered on top of one another—are presented as one collage. Amid this sensory barrage, themes of sexual violence, community, confidence and joy are explored.

metas.name: Una alegoría urbana
metas.overview: En una reinterpretación de la Alegoría de la caverna, un niño de 7 años llamado Jay logra liberarse de sus cadenas y escapar del mundo de sombras que siempre conoció. Al salir, descubre un mundo lleno de luz y verdad, enfrentándose a un dilema: ¿debería regresar para liberar a los demás o vivir en la libertad que tanto le ha costado encontrar?

metas.name: Beauty Is Not a Sin
metas.overview: When a young woman attends confession, she admits her fault of resisting temptations, causing the priest to experience a revelation by sharing in her ultimate sin.

metas.name: Super Happy Forever
metas.overview: Accompanied by his friend Miyata, Sano returns to Izu, a seaside resort in Japan where five years before he fell in love with his wife Nagi.

metas.name: Akiplėša
metas.overview: Marija y Kristina, dos adolescentes que sueñan con escapar de la desolación de su ciudad industrial, forman un vínculo único en una escuela de modelos local, donde la promesa de una vida mejor les empuja a idear formas cada vez más extremas de adaptar sus cuerpos jóvenes a imposibles estándares de belleza. Un relato sobre las inseguridades adolescentes en torno a la imagen corporal que se convirtió en la gran ganadora del pasado Festival Internacional de Cine de Locarno (Leopardo de Oro y premio a la mejor ópera prima).

metas.name: Moon
metas.overview: Sarah, una apasionada de las artes marciales mixtas, acepta la propuesta de convertirse en la entrenadora personal de tres hermanas de una acaudalada familia en Jordania. Una vez en el país, no tarda en darse cuenta de que tras la apariencia de privilegio de los Al Farahadi se esconde una realidad mucho más inquietante. Premio Especial del Jurado en el Festival de Locarno.

metas.name: Eight postcards from utopia
metas.overview: Un documental de "metraje encontrado" montado exclusivamente a partir de anuncios publicitarios de la Rumanía postsocialista. Al reunir estos documentos del largo periodo de transición rumano, se consigue hablar y sacar conclusiones acerca de la vida y realidad de todo un país, y del amor y la muerte, del cuerpo y la fragilidad humana, de la naturaleza y lo sobrenatural, de la historia nacional reciente y, por supuesto, del socialismo y el capitalismo.

metas.name: Min Lycka
metas.overview: An old man repairs a chair with great care. However, his goal may differ from that of other people.

metas.name: Witches
metas.overview: Elizabeth Sankey’s deeply personal documentary examines the relationship between the cinematic portrayals of witches and the all-too-real experiences of postpartum depression by utilizing footage that spans the entirety of film history alongside heartrending personal testimony.

metas.name: A Place Without Fear
metas.overview: Through a nonlinear, abstract and surreal form of storytelling, this film  follows a protagonist through a labyrinth of physical and emotional situations, set in a house which acts as both the set for the story and a metaphor for the mind. The techniques used in the film are a mix of analogue and digital: actual painting in the house, digital rendering and avatars, stop-motion painting, drawing, and collaging, with the majority created in Detroit and subsequent scenes finalised in London. With an original score by Susanne Deeken in collaboration with experimental and jazz musicians from Detroit.

metas.name: My First Film
metas.overview: A young filmmaker, Vita, revisits her first chaotic attempt at filmmaking 15 years prior. Shooting a semi-autobiographical film starring her friend Dina, Vita’s eager but inexperienced approach causes the production to spiral into chaos, leading to significant disruptions and a near-fatal accident.

metas.name: Lateral
metas.overview: Cinema history is scoured for hidden depths in this improvised experiment in perception, presented in stereoscopic 3D.

metas.name: Grand Theft Hamlet
metas.overview: Dos amigos desempleados tienen una nueva idea: quieren representar 'Hamlet' de Shakespeare en Grand Theft Auto. Pero incluso en un mundo virtual, la realidad se entromete en una película salvaje y alucinante filmada íntegramente dentro del videojuego ultraviolento.

metas.name: Pepe
metas.overview: A voice  that claims to be from a hippopotamus. A voice that doesn’t understand the perception of time. Pepe, the first and last hippo killed in the Americas, tells his story with the overwhelming orality of these towns.

metas.name: Un movimiento extraño
metas.overview: Buenos Aires, 2019. Lucrecia, que trabaja como guardia de seguridad en un museo, prevé con su péndulo una fuerte subida del valor del dólar y se enamora de una empleada de una casa de cambio.

metas.name: Nöbetçi
metas.overview: Halil spends his nights in a watchtower waiting for an enemy that doesn’t arrive, until suddenly strange lights appear on the horizon. Ali Cherri creates a universe in which a suspended and void time opens the door to ghostly presences from a past made of war. Shot with an extreme and detailed precision of vision and sound, The Watchman is an urgent film that deconstructs the myth of duty, laying bare the absurdity of the omnipresent war rhetoric.

metas.name: Tendaberry
metas.overview: When her boyfriend returns to Ukraine to care for his ailing father, 23-year-old Dakota must navigate the precarious anxiety of holding onto the past and forging her future in the midst of her South Brooklyn universe.

metas.name: Bug Diner
metas.overview: A dissatisfied marriage, a secret crush, and workplace fantasies come to a head in a diner run by a mole with a hot ass.

metas.name: El realismo socialista
metas.overview: Una película realizada "para aportar al debate interno del Partido Socialista" como lo rememora el propio Ruiz, y que mostraba cómo un publicista de derecha va radicalizándose hasta convertirse en un ferviente activista de izquierda, y un obrero que realiza el viaje opuesto, pasando de la izquierda dura hasta el derechismo absoluto.

metas.name: Gasoline Rainbow
metas.overview: With high school in the rearview, five teenagers from inland Oregon embark on one last adventure. Piling into a van with a busted tail light, their mission takes them to a place they’ve never been—the Pacific coast, five hundred miles away. Their plan, in full: “Fuck it.”

metas.name: Dammi
metas.overview: Returning to Paris, a man moves through memories of his past and surreal fragments of the present, searching for connection with his estranged father. On his journey, he meets a French-Algerian woman. As their intimacy grows, he is confronted with his shame and fears while exploring his lost Arab identity… Behind Paris is Algiers.

metas.name: Anu
metas.overview: When a recent widow moves to New Zealand from India, she's forced to confront her grief by completing an ordinary ritual in an extraordinary circumstance: quarantine.

metas.name: Malos hábitos
metas.overview: Las monjas viven en el silencio del convento, siguiendo sus rutinas diarias como una comunidad unida. Sin embargo, un día, una de las hermanas descubre a un hombre enterrado bajo tierra, lo que desencadena una serie de eventos que perturban la armonía y los secretos de la vida conventual. ¿Podrán coexistir los secretos y la armonía en este entorno religioso?

A sus veintisiete años, Alice vive con sus padres y carece de privacidad. La noche de su cumpleaños, sufre un accidente de bicicleta y entra en un breve coma que la hace reflexionar sobre su vida. Decidida a cambiar su situación, decide que es el momento de independizarse y mudarse a su propio espacio.

metas.name: البحر الأحمر يبكي
metas.overview: A haunted woman named Ida journeys from Germany to Jordan, to an eerie and deserted port town on the Red Sea where her partner, Ismail, recently disappeared. Wandering through desolate bars, hotels, and offices, Ida attempts to feel Ismail’s presence one last time and to say goodbye.

metas.name: Boléro
metas.overview: La historia sigue a Marc, un joven que se encuentra en una crisis existencial mientras lucha por superar una ruptura amorosa. En su proceso de sanación, se ve envuelto en un viaje emocional y físico en busca de su verdadera identidad, mientras explora las complejidades del amor y las relaciones.

metas.name: Lemon Tree
metas.overview: At a Halloween carnival, a young father steals a magician’s rabbit to impress his ten-year-old son. The thrill of the petty theft quickly dissolves when the young boy is tasked with getting himself, his father, and his new pet home safe.

metas.name: Taxibol
metas.overview: Conduciendo por las calles de Cuba, Lav Diaz -el famoso director filipino- y Gustavo Flecha -un locuaz taxista cubano- discuten sobre política, emigración, condiciones sociales y amor; tocando muchas historias y experiencias personales, crean un retrato histórico de las condiciones de sus propios países.

metas.name: Incompatível com a Vida
metas.overview: After documenting her pregnancy, director Eliza Capai talks with other women who have had similar experiences, creating a powerful and touching choir of voices that reverberates on universal themes: life, death, mourning and public policies that affect us all.

metas.name: Laberint Sequences
metas.overview: Shot in and around the Laberint d’Horta in Barcelona,  the film charts several journeys into the garden in search of its centre, where a statue of Eros waits. As the film navigates the maze’s false pathways, its recursive structure begins to crack, and a mysterious underworld floods its gates.

metas.name: Four Unloved Women, Adrift on a Purposeless Sea, Experience the Ecstasy of Dissection
metas.overview: Long live the new flesh. Surgery is the new sex. These Cronenbergian epigrams come together in a tableau that reimagines the ecstasy and eroticism of Renaissance sculpture for the future. Or is it already the present?

metas.name: This Closeness
metas.overview: In Philadelphia for the weekend, Tessa and Ben, a couple on the rocks, rent a room in the apartment of Adam, a reclusive stranger who quickly becomes an unwilling voyeur to the most private parts of the couple’s life. Tensions rise as the three enter an intimate battle to gain and reclaim territory.

metas.name: Rotting in the Sun
metas.overview: Un cineasta que enfrenta una crisis existencial se va de vacaciones a una playa nudista gay en México, donde conoce a una celebridad de las redes sociales que lo convence para colaborar con él en su nuevo programa de televisión.

metas.name: Touch of Crude
metas.overview: When a woman moves into a new house she is visited by a mysterious entity, a Black Box, which upon peering through its peephole unlocks multiple universes, each viewed from a different woman's perspective. Short film created for the Prada SS23 women's collection.

metas.name: Blank Narcissus (Passion of the Swamp)
metas.overview: An ageing director commentates on a porno he directed 50 years ago, reminiscing on his relationship with the lead actor.

metas.name: Ungentle
metas.overview: A film exploring the complicated relationship between British espionage and male homosexuality.

metas.name: Moor Mother: Jazz Codes
metas.overview: Poet, musician, visual artist, and Afrofuturist Moor Mother roams a hallucinatory Mojave Desert alone. Meanwhile, in Los Angeles, Moor Mother visits the Pan Afrikan Peoples Arkestra HQ and plays with jazz luminaries and elders, including Henry “The Skipper” Franklin, Michael Session, and Maia.

metas.name: Aftersun
metas.overview: Sophie reflexiona sobre la alegría compartida y la melancolía privada de unas vacaciones que hizo con su padre veinte años atrás. Los recuerdos reales e imaginarios llenan los espacios entre las imágenes mientras intenta reconciliar al padre que conoció con el hombre que no conoció.

metas.name: ਜੱਗੀ
metas.overview: En el Punjab rural, la impotencia de un colegial le lleva a ser acusado de gay, lo que desencadena un acoso implacable. En medio de este tormento y de oscuras revelaciones familiares, lucha contra demonios interiores que le empujan aún más al límite. Cuando se ve presionado para contraer un matrimonio concertado, se ve obligado a tomar una decisión desgarradora.
